659120.name: Survive
659120.description:
Survive is a game about multiplayer survival. Survive with friends and create your own server. The objective in Survive is to simply survive. But can you do it? Gather resources, craft items, and survive!

Survive currently features what is listed below, however we would also like to hear what the players have to say.

Features:

-Resource Gathering (wood and rock gathering)

-Crafting

-Day/night cycle

-Multiplayer (survive with friends)

-Server hosting (players can host their own server within the game menu)

-Base Building

What may be added in the future:

-Weather system

-Extra crafting options
659120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
